title: Under Heaven's Canopy
content: Tonight's sky speaks of God's faithfulness in ways that transcend our earthly concerns. The first quarter reminds us that even in seasons of change, divine love remains constant. As Mars, Saturn shine above, we're reminded that God has numbered every star and calls each by name. In this autumn evening, let the vastness of creation draw your heart to the intimate love of our Creator. The same God who set the celestial bodies in motion cares deeply for your every need. Take a moment to step outside during 9:00 pm - 11:00 pm local time and let the night sky remind you of promises that never fail. Tonight's special feature, the milky way stretches across the celestial dome, serves as a gentle reminder that divine order persists even when our world feels chaotic. Rest in the knowledge that the One who created this magnificent display holds you in perfect love.
celestialConnection: Tonight's first quarter and Mars, Saturn serve as faithful witnesses to God's unchanging character. Even as seasons change, His love remains constant.
specialEvents: The Milky Way stretches across the celestial dome
